sentence: The goal of the task was to benchmark the ability of generative language models to act as AI teachers, replying to a student in a teacher-student dialogue.
masked_sentence: The goal of the task was to benchmark the ability of <mask> to act as AI teachers, replying to a student in a teacher-student dialogue.

sentence: The task aims to assess the performance of state-of-the-art generative models as AI teachers in producing suitable responses within a student-teacher dialogue.
masked_sentence: The task aims to assess the performance of state-of-the-art <mask> as AI teachers in producing suitable responses within a student-teacher dialogue.

sentence: In this paper, we investigate whether current state-of-the-art large language models (LLMs) are effective as AI tutors and whether they demonstrate pedagogical abilities necessary for good AI tutoring in educational dialogues.
masked_sentence: In this paper, we investigate whether current state-of-the-art <mask> are effective as AI tutors and whether they demonstrate pedagogical abilities necessary for good AI tutoring in educational dialogues.
